member.name: F:SoftGear.Strix.Unity.Runtime.WebGL.WebSocketStatus.Connecting
member.summary: Socket has been created. The connection is not yet open.

member.name: F:SoftGear.Strix.Unity.Runtime.WebGL.WebSocketStatus.Open
member.summary: The connection is open and ready to communicate.

member.name: F:SoftGear.Strix.Unity.Runtime.WebGL.WebSocketStatus.Closing
member.summary: The connection is in the process of closing.

member.name: F:SoftGear.Strix.Unity.Runtime.WebGL.WebSocketStatus.Closed
member.summary: The connection is closed or couldn't be opened.

member.name: T:SoftGear.Strix.Unity.Runtime.WebGL.WebSocketChannel.SimpleArrayBuffer
member.summary: An ad-hoc private implementation of used to buffer incoming and outgoing messages in WebGL builds. Since stores data in multiple chunks and browser's WebSocket API can only accept a single buffer, using requires merging data from chunks to another buffer before sending. Also, since WebGL builds are single-threaded, buffer implementation can be simplified even further.

member.name: T:SoftGear.Strix.Unity.Runtime.WebGL.WebSocketProcessor
member.summary: Used to create WebSocket channel for Unity WebGL builds.
